name: Severed Steel Digital Deluxe Version
description:
In addition to the full game, the Severed Steel Digital Deluxe Edition includes the following content:

Severed Steel Official Soundtrack:

Composed and recorded by Floating Door, the soundtrack is an absorbing 2+ hour journey through a diverse selection of electronic soundscapes and tracks, ranging from spacey ambience to thumping drum and bass. Features 59 tracks, including 15 previously unreleased bonus songs.

Severed Steel Digital Artbook:

See how the stylish world of Severed Steel came together in this collection of concept sketches, storyboards, in-game imagery, and more.
